title: Mini CSS Extract Plugin Loader options

publicPath.description: Specifies a custom public path for the external resources like images, files, etc inside CSS.

emit.description: If true, emits a file (writes a file to the filesystem). If false, the plugin will extract the CSS but will not emit the file

esModule.description: Generates JS modules that use the ES modules syntax.

defaultExport.description: Duplicate the named export with CSS modules locals to the default export (only when `esModules: true` for css-loader).
